PH039 - An Important Testimony to our Brethren and Sisters in New York (1887)


        To our Brethren in the N. Y. Conference. 

     THE FOLLOWING LETTER WAS RECEIVED FROM SISTER WHITE BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE NEW YORK CONFERENCE AFTER THE CLOSE OF THE GENERAL MEETING, HELD AT ROME JAN. 7-11. IT WILL SPEAK FOR ITSELF:--
